title: The Greek and Roman history illustrated by coins & medals representing their religions, rites, manners, customs, games, feasts, arts and sciences : together with a succint account of their emperors, consuls, cities, colonies and families, in two parts, necessary for the introduction of youth into all the useful knowledge of antiquity / by O.W.
author: Walker, Obadiah, 1616-1699.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by G. Croom, for William Miller ... and Christopher Wilkinson ...,
